mean_cn: n. 恢复，复位，王政复辟，归还
mean_en: the act or process of returning something to its original condition by repairing it, cleaning it, etc.
word_etyma: restor 恢复 + ation 表示行为、情况、状态、过程、结果 → n. 恢复；复位；王政复辟；归还
sentence: The restoration of the temple to its former glory will take a long while.
sentence_trans: 复原昔日辉煌的寺庙需要很长一段时间。
